verses.text: Send help, Lord, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* mercy \w has|strong="H1732"\w* come \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w an|strong="H5921"\w* end; there \w is|strong="H1732"\w* no \w more|strong="H5921"\w* faith \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* children \w of|strong="H5921"\w* men.

\w Everyone|strong="H0120"\w* says false words \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* neighbour: \w their|strong="H3068"\w* tongues \w are|strong="H1121"\w* smooth \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* talk, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* hearts \w are|strong="H1121"\w* full \w of|strong="H1121"\w* deceit.

\w The|strong="H1696"\w* smooth \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* tongue \w of|strong="H0376"\w* pride \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* cut \w off|strong="H7453"\w* \w by|strong="H8193"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* Lord.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, \w With|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w tongues|strong="H3956"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3605"\w* overcome; \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* ours: \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w over|strong="H3068"\w* us?

\w Because|strong="H0834"\w* \w of|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* crushing \w of|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* poor \w and|strong="H8193"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* weeping \w of|strong="H0559"\w* \w those|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H0559"\w* need, now \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* come \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* help, \w says|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0113"\w*; \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* give \w him|strong="H0854"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* salvation \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* desiring.

\w The|strong="H0559"\w* words \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w true|strong="H3068"\w* words: \w like|strong="H3068"\w* silver tested \w by|strong="H3068"\w* fire \w and|strong="H6965"\w* burned clean seven times.

\w You|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* keep \w them|strong="H3068"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w you|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* keep \w them|strong="H3068"\w* safe \w from|strong="H0776"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* generation \w for|strong="H0776"\w* ever.

\w The|strong="H4480"\w* sinners \w are|strong="H3068"\w* walking \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w every|strong="H1755"\w* side, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* evil \w is|strong="H3068"\w* honoured \w among|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* children \w of|strong="H3068"\w* men.
